Reference

Authentication

Functions used for authenticating

ig_auth()

Log in to Instagram

ig_sync_features()

Synchronise experiments

Retrieve Functions

Functions used for getting data

ig_get_user_id()

Return the user ID from a username

ig_get_user_feed()

Get a user's timeline feed

ig_get_hashtag_feed()

Get the feed for a hashtag

ig_get_location_feed()

Get the feed for a location

ig_get_popular_feed()

Get the feed of most popular current posts on Instagram

ig_get_liked_feed()

Get feed of your liked media

ig_get_saved_feed()

Get feed of your saved media

ig_get_followers()

Get all followers of user

ig_get_following()

Get all users that a user follows

ig_get_user_tags()

Get all posts that a user was tagged in

ig_get_geomedia()

Get all locations that a user was tagged at

Search Functions

Functions used for searching data

ig_search_users()

ig_search_users

ig_search_username()

Search for a user's profile by username

ig_search_tags()

ig_search_tags

Media Functions

Functions typically used to interact with media (a.k.a. posts)

ig_like()

Like a specified post

ig_unlike()

Unlike a specified post

ig_save()

Saves a specified post

ig_unsave()

Unsaves a specified post

ig_comment()

Writes a comment on a specified post

ig_comment_delete()

Deletes a comment on a specified post

ig_get_media_info()

ig_get_media_info

ig_get_media_comments()

ig_get_media_comments NEEDS HELP

ig_get_media_likers()

ig_get_media_likers

ig_edit_media()

ig_edit_media

ig_delete_media()

ig_delete_media

Activity Functions

Functions for recent activity and timelines as it relates to your account

ig_my_timeline()

Get the authenticated user's timeline feed

ig_my_inbox()

Get direct inbox messages for your account

ig_my_recent_activity()

Get news feed of recent activities by you

ig_following_recent_activity()

Get news feed of recent activities for accounts you follow

ig_autocomplete_userlist()

Get bootstrap user data (autocompletion user list)
